Game is nice, one of the worst communitys ever tho.
A game that gives the option to start a voting kick, but not a surrender vote with 5 man.
A game where you get punished by being kicked by a 4 man lobby because you did not clutch, ace or got 40 kills in 5 rounds.
A game where if your team is losing, your team is probably mad, and if you re winning, your team is still mad because they lost a round and cant 16-0, leading to all players in the game lose their concentration and probably lose the game, maybe even divorce, who knows.

Unless you want to wait for a game from 2-12 minutes, and the get kicked because you are doing poorly on that match, dont buy it.
Great if you wanna hear some russian screaming and rise the toxicity in your body to levels beyond Chernobyl.

Would recommend for sure.
